<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"Get member graph data"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/analytics/member-graph-data/{memberId}"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



Retrieve time-series data for a specific member's active points balance

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"memberId","in":"path","required":true,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"uuid","description":"ID of the member"}},{"name":"start-date","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"Start date for the data range (YYYY-MM-DD)"}},{"name":"end-date","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"End date for the data range (YYYY-MM-DD)"}},{"name":"group-by","in":"query","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string","enum":["day","week","month","year"],"default":"day","description":"Time interval to group data by"}}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>

<StatusCodes
  id={undefined}
  label={undefined}
  responses={{"200":{"description":"Member graph data retrieved successfully","content":{"application/json":{"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"object","properties":{"date":{"type":"string","format":"date","description":"The date for this data point","example":"2025-06-15"},"activePointsBalance":{"type":"integer","description":"Active points balance for the member on this date","example":2500}},"title":"MemberGraphDataPoint"}}}}},"400":{"description":"Bad request - Invalid parameters"},"401":{"description":"Unauthorized"},"404":{"description":"Member not found"},"500":{"description":"Internal Server Error"}}}
>
  
</StatusCodes>
